# motionEffects

**Instance Property**

The array of motion effects for the view.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var motionEffects: [UIMotionEffect] { get set }
```

## Using motion effects

- **addMotionEffect(_:)**: Begins applying a motion effect to the view.
- **removeMotionEffect(_:)**: Stops applying a motion effect to the view.
